enhanced_by.reason: The putAll method can be used to set up the initial state of the map before testing the put method.
Checking if the key already exists in the map can help in setting up the test scenario for the put method.
The get method can be used to verify that the value was correctly added to the map after invoking the put method.
The size method can be used to verify that the size of the map has increased by one after invoking the put method.
